io.janusproject.kernel.services.gson

Class GsonEventSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.services.network.AbstractEventSerializer
      • io.janusproject.kernel.services.gson.GsonEventSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventSerializer

    public class GsonEventSerializer
extends AbstractEventSerializer
    Serialize the EventDispatch content using GSON to generate the corresponding EventEnvelope.

    This implementation assumes that an EventEncrypter and Gson are injected.

    Version:
    2.0.3.0 2015-11-30 17:37:13
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland, Nicolas Gaud
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

      • GsonEventSerializer

        @Inject
public GsonEventSerializer(Gson gson,
                                   EventEncrypter encrypter)
        Constructs an GsonEventSerializer. The Gson is injected. The EventEncrypter is injected.
        Parameters:
        gson - - the instance of the Gson engine to use.
        encrypter - - the object that permits to encrypter the events.
